main event: Two USAF pilots flying a C-47 over Frankfurt/Main, Germany sighted a very bright light passing in front of them at high speed. The object made abrupt and unusual maneuvers before disappearing at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The object was seen traveling at an extremely high rate of speed, making abrupt turns and maneuvers similar to those of a dogfight.
The sighting was also reported to the Frankfurt Flight Service, which confirmed that no jet aircraft were operating in the vicinity at the time of the sighting.
There were two lights observed at the same time, with the second light appearing ahead and slightly to the left of the aircraft.
The weather conditions at Rhein Main at the time of the sighting included 1500 ft broken clouds and visibility of 5 mi with continuous drizzle.
The object appeared flame or reddish-brown in color and moved in a non-consistent manner, appearing bright against the dark background of the sky.
sighted object: a very bright light passing in front of the pilots at high speed
photographs: yes, one page contains a photograph or sketch of the object
